script: setTimeout(function() {var skills = [100, 95, 60, 30, 20, 20];Array.prototype.forEach.call(document.querySelectorAll(".skills h4"), function(skill, i) {skill.style.width = skills[i] + "%"; skill.children[0].addEventListener("click", function() { fn.route("contact/"); }); });}, 500);

Hi, I'm Adrian Cooney

A developer and designer.

I'm an irish student from Cavan, Ireland. I'm studying Computer Science and IT in NUI Galway. Currently, I based in Cavan and working freelance doing design and development.

I specialize in web development and can provide form server management to site design to backend development. I usually work with technologies such as Node.js for realtime web applications or Objective-C to build native iOS apps for the App Store.
